cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Learn how to use Xperience by Kentico's own APIs to customize the data types available for content type and custom module fields, enabling serialized embedded structured content with full product support.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Embedded structured content and the power of custom data types
cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaShortDescription: Learn how to use Xperience by Kentico's own APIs to customize the data types available for content type and custom module fields, enabling serialized embedded structured content with full product support.
cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaTitle: Embedded structured content and the power of custom data types
